text: Ezɨ Esra ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir God, an en inazir afeziabar God, kɨ bar a mɨnabagha an ziam fe! An Atrivim Artaserksisɨn nɨghnɨzim fezɨ, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenir Jerusalemɨn itim deragha a damuasa ifuegha tuavir kam atɨ.7:27 Esra uabɨ sapta 7:27--9:15 osiri, ezɨ gumazir igharazim saptan igharaziba osiri.
